description: This file defines the WebsiteKnowledgeBase class, which manages the process of reading website data, loading it into a vector database, and supporting asynchronous operations. It extends AgentKnowledge and interacts with WebsiteReader, Document, and vector database components.

classes.name: WebsiteKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages website data ingestion, processing, and storage in a vector database, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: set_reader
methods.description: Initializes the WebsiteReader if not already set, using class parameters.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects from each URL.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects from each URL.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads website data into the vector database synchronously, with options to recreate, upsert, and filter.

methods.name: async_load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads website data into the vector database with similar options as load().
